content.html: It's an inappropriate April Fool's joke by a supervisor. As an employer, the worst prank I might pull is this (stolen meme), though arguably, luring people in with the promise of Krispy Kreme and giving veggies sticks may cause a mutiny.
content.value:
It's an inappropriate April Fool's joke by a supervisor.

As an employer, the worst prank I might pull is this (stolen meme), though arguably, luring people in with the promise of Krispy Kreme and giving veggies sticks may cause a mutiny.
